import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Button, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, Alert, Col, Row } from "reactstrap"; const Mylogin = () => { const [values, setValues] = useState({ photo: "", email: "", firstName: "", lastName: "", experience: "", password: "", company: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { setValues({ ...values, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("Form values:", values); // Perform necessary actions like submitting the form data }; return (

Apply as a mentor

Lovely to see you! Filling out the form only takes a couple of minutes. We'd love to learn more about your background and the ins-and-outs of why you'd like to become a mentor. Keep things personal and talk directly to us and your mentees. We don't need jargon and polished cover letters here! You agree to our code of conduct and the mentor agreement by sending the form, so be sure to have a look at those.
); }; export default Mylogin;
